mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, username, password, gender, city, phone_number, email, bank_card_number, identity, create_time, update_time, state) VALUES (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{city}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{bankCardNumber}, #{identity}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{state});
